remarks:
Two ways to express " ` A ` is a prime number (or 1)."  See also ~ isprm .  (Contributed by NM, 4-May-2005.) 

---

 Two ways to express " ` A ` is a prime number (or 1)."  (Contributed by NM, 4-May-2005.)
statement:
prime $p |- ( A e. NN -> ( A. x e. NN ( ( A / x ) e. NN -> ( x = 1 \/ x = A ) ) <-> A. x e. NN ( ( 1 < x /\ x <_ A /\ ( A / x ) e. NN ) -> x = A ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
